department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Call for Proposals: Phase 1 - SMI Minimum Security Health Services Retrofit at Stony Mountain Institution
description: Retrofit of the existing Health Unit at Stony Mountain Institution, building F34, including expansion into adjacent vacant office space. Contractor to complete work one year after contract award.
full_summary:
_____________________________
### Project Bid Opportunity: CSC Minimum Health Services Retrofit 
===========================

### Project Details 

- **Project Number:** WS3615392155
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Publication Date**: November 16, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 8, 2022 at 14:00 MST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: February 15, 2024

### Project Description 

The project involves the retrofit of the existing Health Unit at Stony Mountain Institution, located in Manitoba. The renovation includes expansion into adjacent vacant office space. Construction will be phased, but existing healthcare services will be relocated prior to construction and will remain elsewhere throughout the construction phase. The approximate area of demolition and new construction is 130 square meters.

### Evaluation Criteria 

The selection criteria for this project is the lowest price among all qualified bidders.

### Additional Details 

- **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entities**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)

### Contact Information 

- **Contact Name**: Vinay Singh (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: [vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: (Not specified)
- **Fax**: (Not specified)

### Notice URL 

The complete project details and specifications can be accessed via the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14655678?extsite=MTQ2NTU2NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14655678?extsite=MTQ2NTU2NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Attachment 

No attachments are included with this notice.

Please note that the closing time for this bid opportunity has been amended and all bids must be submitted by the new deadline. Any bids submitted after the deadline will be considered non-responsive. _______________________________  end of entry \___________________________ .
